conversations.content:
I'll be arriving in London on March 15th. Last year, I stayed at the 'London Luxury Hotel', which had amazing reviews and ratings. It was super quiet and clean, and my room had a view of the Thames River. It was such a great experience! This time, I want to try out a new hotel. Once I figure out which one is the best, I'll head there and then find a good restaurant to eat at with my friends.
I have a budget of 160 for the hotel, and I want to stay in a hotel with the highest rating. Can you recommend a hotel? Tell me the name, rating, price range, and address. Thanks a bunch!

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user's request, I will first fetch all hotels in London. Then, I will check the prices of those hotels to find options within the user's budget of 160. After determining the relevant hotels, I will retrieve their ratings and reviews. Finally, I will obtain the addresses of the hotels and identify the one with the highest rating. This will lead to a comprehensive response that includes the hotel name, rating, price range, and address.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_hotels_in_city(city="London")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

Hotel Names: Cozy Stay
Mom's Home
London Luxury
Covent Garden Retreat
Riverside View

<function_thought>
I have obtained a list of hotels in London: "Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", and "Riverside View". Next, I need to get the prices for these hotels to find out which of them falls within the user's budget of 160.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_hotels_prices(hotel_names=["Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", "Covent Garden Retreat", "Riverside View"])]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

{'Cozy Stay': 'Price range: 80.0 - 150.0', "Mom's Home": 'Price range: 80.0 - 150.0', 'London Luxury': 'Price range: 80.0 - 150.0', 'Covent Garden Retreat': 'Price range: 80.0 - 150.0', 'Riverside View': 'Price range: 200.0 - 350.0'}

- Covent Garden Retreat: 80.0 - 150.0
- Riverside View: 200.0 - 350.0 (exceeds the budget)

The hotels that fit within the budget of 160 are "Cozy Stay", "Mom's Home", "London Luxury", and "Covent Garden Retreat". Next, I will retrieve the ratings and reviews for these hotels to determine which has the highest rating.
</function_thought>
